mapper.sql: id, openid, out_trade_no, state, create_time, notify_time, total_fee, nickname, head_img, video_id, video_title, video_img, user_id, ip, del, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, tr_paycommodity, tr_partbusercode

tr_commonditycode, tr_partAname, tr_partAphone, tr_partAaddress, tr_partBname, tr_partBphone, tr_partBaddress, tr_type, tr_count, tr_needbegindate, tr_needenddate, tr_begintime, tr_endtime, tr_needdatelist, tr_needtimelist, tr_duration, tr_unitprice, tr_totalprice, tr_remark, reserveone, reservetwo
mapper.select: SELECT a.openid,a.create_time,a.total_fee,b.tr_partAname,b.tr_partAphone, b.tr_partAaddress,b.tr_partBname,b.tr_partBphone,b.tr_partBaddress, c.tr_type,c.tr_count,c.tr_unitprice,c.tr_totaltime,c.tr_needdatelist,c.tr_needtimelist FROM video_order a INNER JOIN tr_order b ON a.reserve3=b.tr_commonditycode INNER JOIN tr_need c ON a.reserve2=c.tr_id WHERE (a.del='0' OR a.del='2') and a.tr_paycommodity='1' and a.state='1' ORDER BY a.notify_time DESC

SELECT a.*,b.tr_partAname,b.tr_partAphone,b.tr_partAaddress,b.tr_partBname,b.tr_partBphone,b.tr_partBaddress, c.tr_cardusername,c.tr_cardnum,c.tr_bankname, d.tr_type,d.tr_count,d.tr_unitprice,d.tr_totaltime,d.tr_needdatelist,d.tr_needtimelist FROM video_order a INNER JOIN tr_order b ON a.reserve3=b.tr_commonditycode INNER JOIN tr_ability c ON a.tr_partbusercode=c.tr_usercode INNER JOIN tr_need d ON a.reserve2=d.tr_id WHERE a.tr_paycommodity='1' and a.del='1' and a.state='1' ORDER BY a.notify_time DESC

SELECT a.*,b.tr_partAname,b.tr_partAphone,b.tr_partAaddress,b.tr_partBname,b.tr_partBphone,b.tr_partBaddress, c.tr_cardusername,c.tr_cardnum,c.tr_bankname, d.tr_type,d.tr_count,d.tr_unitprice,d.tr_totaltime,d.tr_needdatelist,d.tr_needtimelist FROM video_order a INNER JOIN tr_order b ON a.reserve3=b.tr_commonditycode INNER JOIN tr_ability c ON a.tr_partbusercode=c.tr_usercode INNER JOIN tr_need d ON a.reserve2=d.tr_id WHERE a.tr_paycommodity='1' and a.del='3' and a.state='1' ORDER BY a.notify_time DESC

SELECT a.*,b.tr_partAname,b.tr_partAphone,b.tr_partAaddress,b.tr_partBname,b.tr_partBphone,b.tr_partBaddress, c.tr_cardusername,c.tr_cardnum,c.tr_bankname, d.tr_type,d.tr_count,d.tr_unitprice,d.tr_totaltime,d.tr_needdatelist,d.tr_needtimelist FROM video_order a INNER JOIN tr_order b ON a.reserve3=b.tr_commonditycode INNER JOIN tr_ability c ON a.tr_partbusercode=c.tr_usercode INNER JOIN tr_need d ON a.reserve2=d.tr_id WHERE (a.del='1' AND a.state='2') OR (a.del='3' AND a.state='3') AND a.tr_paycommodity='1' ORDER BY a.reserve1 DESC
mapper.insert: insert into video_order (id, openid, out_trade_no, state, create_time, notify_time, total_fee, nickname, head_img, video_id, video_title, video_img, user_id, ip, del, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, tr_paycommodity, tr_partbusercode) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{notifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trPaycommodity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trPartbusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update video_order

out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select
,
from video_order a left join tr_order b on a.reserve3 = b.tr_commonditycode where 1=1 and tr_paycommodity = '1' and state <> 0 and head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc

select
,
from video_order a left join tr_order b on a.reserve3 = b.tr_commonditycode where 1=1 and tr_paycommodity = '1' and state <> 0 and tr_partbusercode = #{trPartbusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by create_time desc
